member.name: T:Nito.Disposables.AnonymousDisposable
member.summary: Equivalent to .

member.name: M:Nito.Disposables.AnonymousDisposable.#ctor(System.Action)
member.summary: Creates a new disposable that executes when disposed.
member.param: The delegate to execute when disposed. If this is null, then this instance does nothing when it is disposed.

member.name: M:Nito.Disposables.AnonymousDisposable.Add(System.Action)
member.summary: Adds a delegate to be executed when this instance is disposed. If this instance is already disposed or disposing, then is executed immediately. If this method is called multiple times concurrently at the same time this instance is disposed, then the different arguments may be disposed concurrently.
member.param: The delegate to add. May be null to indicate no additional action.

member.name: M:Nito.Disposables.AnonymousDisposable.Create(System.Action)
member.summary: Creates a new disposable that executes when disposed.
member.param: The delegate to execute when disposed. If this is null, then this instance does nothing when it is disposed.

member.name: T:Nito.Disposables.CollectionDisposable
member.summary: Disposes a collection of disposables.

member.name: M:Nito.Disposables.CollectionDisposable.#ctor(System.IDisposable[])
member.summary: Creates a disposable that disposes a collection of disposables.
member.param: The disposables to dispose. May not be null, but entries may be null.

member.name: M:Nito.Disposables.CollectionDisposable.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.IDisposable})
member.summary: Creates a disposable that disposes a collection of disposables.
member.param: The disposables to dispose. May not be null, but entries may be null.

member.name: M:Nito.Disposables.CollectionDisposable.Add(System.IDisposable)
member.summary: Adds a disposable to the collection of disposables. If this instance is already disposed or disposing, then is disposed immediately. If this method is called multiple times concurrently at the same time this instance is disposed, then the different arguments may be disposed concurrently.
member.param: The disposable to add to our collection. May be null.

member.name: M:Nito.Disposables.CollectionDisposable.Create(System.IDisposable[])
member.summary: Creates a disposable that disposes a collection of disposables.
member.param: The disposables to dispose. May not be null, but entries may be null.

member.name: M:Nito.Disposables.CollectionDisposable.Create(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.IDisposable})
member.summary: Creates a disposable that disposes a collection of disposables.
member.param: The disposables to dispose. May not be null, but entries may be null.

member.summary: Adds a delegate to be executed when this instance is disposed. If this instance is already disposed or disposing, then is executed immediately. If this method is called multiple times concurrently at the same time this instance is disposed, then the different arguments may be disposed concurrently.
member.param: The delegate to add. May be null to indicate no additional action.

member.summary: Creates a new disposable that executes when disposed.
member.param: The delegate to execute when disposed. If this is null, then this instance does nothing when it is disposed.

member.name: T:Nito.Disposables.Internals.BoundActionField`1
member.summary: A field containing a bound action.
member.typeparam: The type of context for the action.

member.name: M:Nito.Disposables.Internals.BoundActionField`1.#ctor(System.Action{`0},`0)
member.summary: Initializes the field with the specified action and context.
member.param: The action delegate.
The context.

member.name: P:Nito.Disposables.Internals.BoundActionField`1.IsEmpty
member.summary: Whether the field is empty.

member.name: M:Nito.Disposables.Internals.BoundActionField`1.TryGetAndUnset
member.summary: Atomically retrieves the bound action from the field and sets the field to null. May return null.

member.name: M:Nito.Disposables.Internals.BoundActionField`1.TryUpdateContext(System.Func{`0,`0})
member.summary: Attempts to update the context of the bound action stored in the field. Returns false if the field is null.
member.param: The function used to update an existing context. This may be called more than once if more than one thread attempts to simultaneously update the context.

member.name: T:Nito.Disposables.Internals.BoundActionField`1.IBoundAction
member.summary: An action delegate bound with its context.

member.name: M:Nito.Disposables.Internals.BoundActionField`1.IBoundAction.Invoke
member.summary: Executes the action. This should only be done after the bound action is retrieved from a field by .

member.name: T:Nito.Disposables.Internals.EnumerableExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods for enumerables.

member.name: M:Nito.Disposables.Internals.EnumerableExtensions.WhereNotNull``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0})
member.summary: Returns a sequence with the `null` instances removed.

member.name: T:Nito.Disposables.Internals.IReferenceCounter
member.summary: A reference count for an underlying target.

member.name: M:Nito.Disposables.Internals.IReferenceCounter.TryIncrementCount
member.summary: Increments the reference count and returns true. If the reference count has already reached zero, returns false.

member.name: M:Nito.Disposables.Internals.IReferenceCounter.TryDecrementCount
member.summary: Decrements the reference count and returns null. If this call causes the reference count to reach zero, returns the underlying target.

member.name: M:Nito.Disposables.Internals.IReferenceCounter.TryGetTarget
member.summary: Returns the underlying target. Returns null if the reference count has already reached zero.

member.name: T:Nito.Disposables.Internals.ReferenceCountedDisposable`1
member.summary: An instance that represents a reference count.

member.name: M:Nito.Disposables.Internals.ReferenceCountedDisposable`1.#ctor(Nito.Disposables.Internals.IReferenceCounter)
member.summary: Initializes a reference counted disposable that refers to the specified reference count. The specified reference count must have already been incremented for this instance.

member.name: T:Nito.Disposables.Internals.ReferenceCounter
member.summary: A reference count for an underlying target.

member.name: M:Nito.Disposables.Internals.ReferenceCounter.#ctor(System.Object)
member.summary: Creates a new reference counter with a reference count of 1 referencing the specified target.

member.name: T:Nito.Disposables.Internals.ReferenceCounterEphemerons
member.summary: The collection of reference counters, stored as ephemerons.

member.name: M:Nito.Disposables.Internals.ReferenceCounterEphemerons.TryGetAndIncrementOrCreate(System.Object)
member.summary: Increments and returns the reference counter for the specified target, creating it if necessary. Returns null if the reference counter has already reached 0.

member.name: T:Nito.Disposables.Internals.WeakReferenceCountedDisposable`1
member.summary: An instance that represents an uncounted weak reference.

member.name: M:Nito.Disposables.Internals.WeakReferenceCountedDisposable`1.#ctor(Nito.Disposables.Internals.IReferenceCounter)
member.summary: Creates an instance that weakly references the specified reference counter. The specified reference counter should not be incremented.

member.name: T:Nito.Disposables.IReferenceCountedDisposable`1
member.summary: An instance that represents a reference count. All members are threadsafe.

member.name: M:Nito.Disposables.IReferenceCountedDisposable`1.AddWeakReference
member.summary: Adds a weak reference to this reference counted disposable. Throws if this instance is disposed.

member.name: M:Nito.Disposables.IReferenceCountedDisposable`1.AddReference
member.summary: Returns a new reference to this reference counted disposable, incrementing the reference counter. Throws if this instance is disposed.

member.name: P:Nito.Disposables.IReferenceCountedDisposable`1.Target
member.summary: Gets the target object. Throws if this instance is disposed.

member.name: P:Nito.Disposables.IReferenceCountedDisposable`1.IsDisposeStarted
member.summary: Whether this instance is currently disposing or has been disposed.

member.name: P:Nito.Disposables.IReferenceCountedDisposable`1.IsDisposed
member.summary: Whether this instance is disposed (finished disposing).

member.name: P:Nito.Disposables.IReferenceCountedDisposable`1.IsDisposing
member.summary: Whether this instance is currently disposing, but not finished yet.

member.name: T:Nito.Disposables.IWeakReferenceCountedDisposable`1
member.summary: An instance that represents an uncounted weak reference. All members are threadsafe.

member.name: M:Nito.Disposables.IWeakReferenceCountedDisposable`1.TryAddReference
member.summary: Adds a reference to this reference counted disposable. Returns null if the underlying disposable has already been disposed or garbage collected.

member.name: M:Nito.Disposables.IWeakReferenceCountedDisposable`1.TryGetTarget
member.summary: Attempts to get the target object. Returns null if the underlying disposable has already been disposed or garbage collected.

member.name: T:Nito.Disposables.NoopDisposable
member.summary: A singleton disposable that does nothing when disposed.

member.name: M:Nito.Disposables.NoopDisposable.Dispose
member.summary: Does nothing.

member.name: P:Nito.Disposables.NoopDisposable.Instance
member.summary: Gets the instance of .

member.name: T:Nito.Disposables.ReferenceCountedDisposable
member.summary: Creation methods for reference counted disposables.

member.name: M:Nito.Disposables.ReferenceCountedDisposable.Create``1(``0)
member.summary: Creates a new disposable that disposes when all reference counts have been disposed. This method uses attached (ephemeron) reference counters.
member.param: The disposable to dispose when all references have been disposed. If this is null, then the returned instance does nothing when it is disposed.

member.name: M:Nito.Disposables.ReferenceCountedDisposable.TryCreate``1(``0)
member.summary: Creates a new disposable that disposes when all reference counts have been disposed. This method uses attached (ephemeron) reference counters.
member.param: The disposable to dispose when all references have been disposed. If this is null, then the returned instance does nothing when it is disposed.

member.name: M:Nito.Disposables.ReferenceCountedDisposable.CreateWithNewReferenceCounter``1(``0)
member.summary: Creates a new disposable that disposes when all reference counts have been disposed. This method creates a new reference counter to keep track of the reference counts.
member.param: The disposable to dispose when all references have been disposed. If this is null, then the returned instance does nothing when it is disposed.

member.name: T:Nito.Disposables.SingleDisposable`1
member.summary: A base class for disposables that need exactly-once semantics in a thread-safe way. All disposals of this instance block until the disposal is complete.
member.typeparam: The type of "context" for the derived disposable. Since the context should not be modified, strongly consider making this an immutable type.

remarks.para: If is called multiple times, only the first call will execute the disposal code. Other calls to will wait for the disposal to complete.

member.name: F:Nito.Disposables.SingleDisposable`1._context
member.summary: The context. This is never null. This is empty if this instance has already been disposed (or is being disposed).

member.name: M:Nito.Disposables.SingleDisposable`1.#ctor(`0)
member.summary: Creates a disposable for the specified context.
member.param: The context passed to . May be null.

member.name: P:Nito.Disposables.SingleDisposable`1.IsDisposeStarted
member.summary: Whether this instance is currently disposing or has been disposed.

member.name: P:Nito.Disposables.SingleDisposable`1.IsDisposed
member.summary: Whether this instance is disposed (finished disposing).

member.name: P:Nito.Disposables.SingleDisposable`1.IsDisposing
member.summary: Whether this instance is currently disposing, but not finished yet.

member.name: M:Nito.Disposables.SingleDisposable`1.Dispose(`0)
member.summary: The actual disposal method, called only once from .
member.param: The context for the disposal operation.

member.name: M:Nito.Disposables.SingleDisposable`1.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes this instance.

remarks.para: If is called multiple times, only the first call will execute the disposal code. Other calls to will wait for the disposal to complete.

member.name: M:Nito.Disposables.SingleDisposable`1.TryUpdateContext(System.Func{`0,`0})
member.summary: Attempts to update the stored context. This method returns false if this instance has already been disposed (or is being disposed).
member.param: The function used to update an existing context. This may be called more than once if more than one thread attempts to simultaneously update the context.

member.name: T:Nito.Disposables.SingleNonblockingDisposable`1
member.summary: A base class for disposables that need exactly-once semantics in a thread-safe way.
member.typeparam: The type of "context" for the derived disposable. Since the context should not be modified, strongly consider making this an immutable type.

remarks.para: If is called multiple times, only the first call will execute the disposal code. Other calls to will not wait for the disposal to complete.

member.name: F:Nito.Disposables.SingleNonblockingDisposable`1._context
member.summary: The context. This is never null. This is empty if this instance has already been disposed (or is being disposed).

member.name: M:Nito.Disposables.SingleNonblockingDisposable`1.#ctor(`0)
member.summary: Creates a disposable for the specified context.
member.param: The context passed to . May be null.

member.name: P:Nito.Disposables.SingleNonblockingDisposable`1.IsDisposed
member.summary: Whether this instance has been disposed (or is being disposed).

member.name: M:Nito.Disposables.SingleNonblockingDisposable`1.Dispose(`0)
member.summary: The actual disposal method, called only once from .
member.param: The context for the disposal operation.

member.name: M:Nito.Disposables.SingleNonblockingDisposable`1.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes this instance.

remarks.para: If is called multiple times, only the first call will execute the disposal code. Other calls to will not wait for the disposal to complete.

member.name: M:Nito.Disposables.SingleNonblockingDisposable`1.TryUpdateContext(System.Func{`0,`0})
member.summary: Attempts to update the stored context. This method returns false if this instance has already been disposed (or is being disposed).
member.param: The function used to update an existing context. This may be called more than once if more than one thread attempts to simultaneously update the context.
